summary: The diff shows only metadata changes to project_state.json with no implementation of HTML email templates, email signature with logo, plain-text fallbacks, or updates to email sending logic. All requirements REQ-9 and REQ-10 are missing from the implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create professional HTML email templates for all outgoing customer notifications with greeting, content in list format, and signature section with Nebadon Encryption logo and clickable link to nencrypt.com
missing_requirements.reason: No HTML email template code or structure is present in the diff. Only project_state.json metadata was modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure templates are responsive and include plain-text fallback versions
missing_requirements.reason: No email template code, responsive design implementation, or plain-text fallback generation is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Customer email signature displays the Nebadon Encryption logo as an inline image
missing_requirements.reason: No logo embedding logic, base64 encoding, or inline image implementation is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Customer email signature includes a clickable link to nencrypt.com without explanatory text
missing_requirements.reason: No HTML signature template or link generation code is present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update backend email sending logic to use new HTML templates for customer notifications
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to backend/main.mo or email sending functions are present in the diff. Only project_state.json was modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use simple plain-text formatting for admin notifications without logo or signature
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to admin notification email logic are present in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Email content dynamically populated with project details and formatted as lists
missing_requirements.reason: No template population logic or list formatting implementation is present in the diff.
